analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying NIH Institute and Center Directors and Division Directors or other scientific agencies as policy makers subject to at-will removal will politicize these agencies and science and lead to decisions based on political agendas rather than scientific evidence.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of scientific agencies, loss of institutional knowledge, and the undermining of scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the rule.
